name: 漢語教學語法
description: Pedagogical grammar is a relatively young field, which conentrates on issues and concepts on the over-all principles underlying the actual delivery in the instruction of L2 Chinese grammar. It is not part of the actual teaching of grammar, but a set of principles of guidelines.
goals: 漢語教學語法旨在使同學們有效利用語法點於華語教學
syllabus:
Week 1 Introduction; Orientation

Week 2教學語法介紹與界定

Week 3 Towards a Pedagogical Grammar of Chinese

Week 4教學法的必要性與規則的關係

Week 5 Acquisition and pedagogy in Chinese as a Foreign Languages

Week 6簡易性的準則

Week 7對外漢語語法點難易度的評定

Week 8漢語語法現象討論  (I)

Week 9語法點的排序

Week 10個別談話

Week 11對外漢語語法點的描述原則

Week 12對比分析與教學語法

Week 13 The Acquisition of 了Le in L2 Chinese

Week 14漢語詞類的教學語法

Week 15漢語語法現象討論 (II)

Week 16認知理論,  功能語法， 類型學vs.  對外漢語教學語法

Week 17語法教學特點

Week 18 Final Paper Oral Presentation
